description: "Heartbroken" festival bosses say ongoing Covid-19 restrictions mean the event can't go ahead.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey Weekender Festival cancelled
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey Weekender Festival cancelled - BBC News
maintext: A spokesperson for the festival said: "We are aware that this announcement may have come slightly later than many would have expected, however we waited as long as we possibly could for official government guidance to be published while we explored every possible avenue to keep the festival alive in 2020.
